name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write2Learn — 输入记忆、智能复习、AI语法分析的高效学习助手

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write2Learn — An Efficient Learning Assistant for Input Memory, Smart Review, and AI Grammar Analysis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Write2Learn: Your Ultimate English Learning Companion! 🌟 (Write2Learn：你的终极英语学习伴侣！)

Dive into Real-life Contexts with Words 💬 (在情景对话上下文中了解单词的实际用法)

👁‍🗨 Understand how words are used in different situations through interactive dialogues. (通过互动对话了解单词在不同情境中的使用方法)

All-in-One Dictionary Integration 📚 (集合了柯林斯词典, 剑桥词典查词, 英英释义的方法)

👁‍🗨 Access Collins and Cambridge dictionaries for word definitions, and think in English to understand words better. (访问柯林斯和剑桥词典以获取单词定义，用英语思维更好地理解单词)

AI-Powered Text Analysis 🧠 (AI文字分析英语句子结构,语法和英语时态)

👁‍🗨 Analyze sentence structures, grammar, and tenses with AI. Never fear complex sentences again! (使用AI分析句子结构、语法和时态，再也不怕复杂句子！)

Visual Sentence Diagrams 🖼️ (AI图解句子单词词性,句子结构,语法和英语时态)

👁‍🗨 Visualize parts of speech, sentence structures, and grammar for a clear understanding of each sentence. (可视化单词词性、句子结构和语法，清晰理解每个句子)

Authoritative Dictionary Exercises ✍️ (权威词典例句练习, 网站句子练习)

👁‍🗨 Practice with authoritative dictionary examples and website sentences to improve your writing skills. (通过权威词典例句和网站句子练习提高写作技能)

On-the-Go Word Lookup and Fill-in-the-Blank Exercises 🔍 (支持网页划词查询, 挖词填空练习)

👁‍🗨 Highlight words on any webpage to look them up or create fill-in-the-blank exercises. Chat with AI anytime! (在任何网页上高亮单词进行查询或创建挖词填空练习，随时与AI聊天！)

Track Your Learning Progress 📈 (单词学习记录)

👁‍🗨 Keep track of learned words and today's progress for a clear view of your learning journey. (记录已学单词和今日学习情况，一目了然地查看学习进展)

Customize Your AI Model 🛠️ (支持自定义AI大模型)

👁‍🗨 Choose and customize your preferred AI model for a tailored learning experience. (选择并自定义你喜欢的AI模型，打造个性化学习体验)

Import, Export, and Clear Data 🔄 (支持导入数据, 导出数据和清除数据)

👁‍🗨 Easily back up your data with import, export, and clear options. (通过导入、导出和清除选项轻松备份数据)

Custom Prompts for Quick Access ⚡ (支持自定义提示词prompt)

👁‍🗨 Create and quickly access custom prompts for a more efficient learning process. (创建并快速访问自定义提示词，提高学习效率)


✨ Start your journey with Write2Learn today and master English effortlessly! (今天就开始你的Write2Learn之旅，轻松掌握英语！) ✨
